Hugin, Durin and Lunin... my siblings. It's wonderful for family to be posted at the same place. We all belong to the same guild, but we only got this post because of Uncle Donal's patronage. We're fortunate.
Family is a precious gift. If you have family, why don't you remind them that you care with a small gift? You can store it here and pick it up later from the family village.
